# 50-microservice.txt - AUTOGENERATED, DO NOT MODIFY MANUALLY

# Set up microservice
RUN wget -O sdno-service-l2vpn-1.0.0-RC0.zip https://nexus.open-o.org/content/repositories/autorelease-1052/org/openo/sdno/l2vpn/l2vpnservice-deployment/1.0.0-RC0/l2vpnservice-deployment-1.0.0-RC0.zip
RUN unzip -o -B sdno-service-l2vpn-1.0.0-RC0.zip
RUN rm -f sdno-service-l2vpn-1.0.0-RC0.zip
EXPOSE 8509
RUN echo Open-O 1.0.0-RC0 autorelease-1052 > VERSION
